comments.body: -Â  Â  I think that Donaire's fight with Santiago looks like he will have a hard time and from what I can see he will lose there. If you just observe the last fights and the ones he fought recently, the movement performances shown by Doinare are not good, I don't know if others who are fans of Donaire have noticed this too.But of course, this is just my assumption, I hope he wins and finds Santiago a hole so that this will be his chance to win their match.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: Quote from: Mr. Magkaisa on July 12, 2023, 06:37:11 AMÂ  Â  Â  Â -Â  Â  I think that Donaire's fight with Santiago looks like he will have a hard time and from what I can see he will lose there. If you just observe the last fights and the ones he fought recently, the movement performances shown by Doinare are not good, I don't know if others who are fans of Donaire have noticed this too.But of course, this is just my assumption, I hope he wins and finds Santiago a hole so that this will be his chance to win their match.Indeed it is obvious enough that Donaire is getting slower as he age and that is somehow normal for boxers who are still fighting at that age because nobody can escape father time. Besides, any boxer in the industry will have a hard time keeping their speed as if they are still on the height of their prime but for Donaire's situation, his speed might've decreased overtime but I'm still confident that he is still packing a lot of power in his fist and that will be the biggest factor on why he still has an upper hand in this fight.
